comment._content: This is almost definitely the U.S. Fish Commission Building, then located just down B Street (now Independence Ave.) from the Smithsonian - compare the image on pg. 350 of the 2nd ed. of Goode's Capital Loses.

comment._content: AGodsKnight: You wrote: Why is this all blue.? You never heard of Photoshop. Think and read a little before making critical comments here, OK? This is an example of an early printing called Cyanotype.
